import useSharedState from '../hook/useSharedState' import TradingViewWidget, { Themes } from 'react-tradingview-widget'; function Chart() { const fixedLength=(y)=> { let num = y; let prec = 6; while(num > 10) { num /= 10; prec--; } return y.toFixed(prec); } const {selectedToken,setSelectedToken,long,setLong,ask,setAsk}=useSharedState();//useState(undefined); return (
